summary: The chat history details recent development and testing activities for the 'bchat' system. Key areas of focus included integrating Claude Code, setting up multi-provider APIs, configuring Claude Sonnet 4, and preparing the system for production deployment. Testing activities were also conducted to ensure functionality and immediate processing.

sections.title: Key Achievements
items: Proceed with workspace cleanup for the bchat system.
Integrate multi-provider APIs into the bchat system.
Configure Claude Sonnet 4 for the bchat system.
